titles.title: Federal Agency Transparency Act
To require Federal agencies to show receipts and expenditures every two weeks on agency websites.

bill.summary: 3/14/2011--Introduced. Federal Agency Transparency Act - Requires each federal agency, at the end of each two-week period, to publish on its official website a statement of all funds received and spent during such period.
